Date: 2025-04-29 08:48
Subject: Medical App
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Hagop,

 

Please be informed that you can now attend your medical test for your visa renewal.

 

In case you are unable to do it on that specific date, you can go on any other day; the medical center’s opening hours are 8:30 AM - 1:30 PM Monday - Thursday, and until 10:00 AM on Fridays.

 

Medical center location: Jafza Service Centre South: https://goo.gl/maps/iiwgPq3UW7SgABxh8 <https://goo.gl/maps/iiwgPq3UW7SgABxh8> 

 

Kindly bring the attached documents with you to the medical center, and your original passport as the same is also required.

 

Regards, 

AHMAD ALHAMAWI​​​​	
ASSOCIATE ‑ PEOPLE RELATIONS	
REAL FZE JORDAN
